verses.verse: וַיִּפֹּ֥ל <S%H5307><s%> vai-yip-Pol fell יוֹסֵ֖ף <S%H3130><s%> yo-Sef And Joseph עַל־ <S%H5921><s%> 'al- over פְּנֵ֣י <S%H6440><s%> pe-Nei face אָבִ֑יו <S%H1><s%> 'a-Viv; upon his father's וַיֵּ֥בְךְּ <S%H1058><s%> vai-Ye-vek and wept עָלָ֖יו <S%H5921><s%> 'a-Lav over וַיִּשַּׁק־ <S%H5401><s%> vai-yish-shak- upon him and kissed לֽוֹ׃ lo.

וַיְצַ֨ו <S%H6680><s%> vay-Tzav commanded יוֹסֵ֤ף <S%H3130><s%> yo-Sef And Joseph אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> 'et- עֲבָדָיו֙ <S%H5650><s%> 'a-va-Dav his servants אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> 'et- הָרֹ֣פְאִ֔ים <S%H7495><s%> ha-Ro-fe-'Im, the physicians לַחֲנֹ֖ט <S%H2590><s%> la-cha-Not to embalm אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> 'et- אָבִ֑יו <S%H1><s%> 'a-Viv; his father וַיַּחַנְט֥וּ <S%H2590><s%> vai-ya-chan-Tu embalmed הָרֹפְאִ֖ים <S%H7495><s%> ha-ro-fe-'Im and the physicians אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> 'et- יִשְׂרָאֵֽל׃ <S%H3478><s%> Yis-ra-'El. Israel

וַיִּמְלְאוּ־ <S%H4390><s%> vai-yim-le-'u- were fulfilled לוֹ֙ lo אַרְבָּעִ֣ים <S%H705><s%> 'ar-ba-'Im And forty י֔וֹם <S%H3117><s%> Yom, days כִּ֛י <S%H3588><s%> ki for כֵּ֥ן <S%H3651><s%> ken such יִמְלְא֖וּ <S%H4390><s%> yim-le-'U for him for so are fulfilled יְמֵ֣י <S%H3117><s%> ye-Mei the days הַחֲנֻטִ֑ים <S%H2590><s%> ha-cha-nu-Tim; of those which are embalmed וַיִּבְכּ֥וּ <S%H1058><s%> vai-yiv-Ku mourned אֹת֛וֹ <S%H853><s%> o-To מִצְרַ֖יִם <S%H4713><s%> mitz-Ra-yim Egyptian שִׁבְעִ֥ים <S%H7657><s%> shiv-'Im for him threescore and ten יֽוֹם׃ <S%H3117><s%> Yom. days

וַיַּֽעַבְרוּ֙ <S%H5674><s%> vai-ya-'av-Ru were past יְמֵ֣י <S%H3117><s%> ye-Mei And when the days בְכִית֔וֹ <S%H1068><s%> ve-chi-To, of his mourning וַיְדַבֵּ֣ר <S%H1696><s%> vay-dab-Ber spake יוֹסֵ֔ף <S%H3130><s%> yo-Sef, Joseph אֶל־ <S%H413><s%> 'el- to בֵּ֥ית <S%H1004><s%> beit unto the house פַּרְעֹ֖ה <S%H6547><s%> par-'Oh of Pharaoh לֵאמֹ֑ר <S%H559><s%> le-Mor; saying אִם־ <S%H518><s%> 'im- If נָ֨א <S%H4994><s%> na now מָצָ֤אתִי <S%H4672><s%> ma-Tza-ti If now I have found חֵן֙ <S%H2580><s%> chen grace בְּעֵ֣ינֵיכֶ֔ם <S%H5869><s%> be-'Ei-nei-Chem, in your eyes דַּבְּרוּ־ <S%H1696><s%> dab-be-ru- speak נָ֕א <S%H4994><s%> na please בְּאָזְנֵ֥י <S%H241><s%> be-'a-ze-Nei I pray you in the ears פַרְעֹ֖ה <S%H6547><s%> far-'Oh of Pharaoh לֵאמֹֽר׃ <S%H559><s%> le-Mor. saying

אָבִ֞י <S%H1><s%> 'a-Vi My father הִשְׁבִּיעַ֣נִי <S%H7650><s%> hish-bi-'A-ni made me swear לֵאמֹ֗ר <S%H559><s%> le-Mor, saying הִנֵּ֣ה <S%H2009><s%> hin-Neh Lo אָנֹכִי֮ <S%H595><s%> 'a-no-Chi I מֵת֒ <S%H4191><s%> met I die בְּקִבְרִ֗י <S%H6913><s%> be-kiv-Ri, in my grave אֲשֶׁ֨ר <S%H834><s%> 'a-Sher which כָּרִ֤יתִי <S%H3738><s%> ka-Ri-ti which I have digged לִי֙ li בְּאֶ֣רֶץ <S%H776><s%> be-'E-retz for me in the land כְּנַ֔עַן <S%H3667><s%> ke-Na-'an, of Canaan שָׁ֖מָּה <S%H8033><s%> Sham-mah there תִּקְבְּרֵ֑נִי <S%H6912><s%> tik-be-Re-ni; there shalt thou bury me וְעַתָּ֗ה <S%H6258><s%> ve-'at-Tah, Now אֶֽעֱלֶה־ <S%H5927><s%> 'e-'e-leh- Now therefore let me go up נָּ֛א <S%H4994><s%> na please וְאֶקְבְּרָ֥ה <S%H6912><s%> ve-'ek-be-Rah I pray thee and bury אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> 'et- אָבִ֖י <S%H1><s%> 'a-Vi my father וְאָשֽׁוּבָה׃ <S%H7725><s%> ve-'a-Shu-vah. and I will come again

וַיֹּ֖אמֶר <S%H559><s%> vai-Yo-mer said פַּרְעֹ֑ה <S%H6547><s%> par-'Oh; And Pharaoh עֲלֵ֛ה <S%H5927><s%> 'a-Leh Go up וּקְבֹ֥ר <S%H6912><s%> u-ke-Vor and bury אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> 'et- אָבִ֖יךָ <S%H1><s%> 'a-Vi-cha thy father כַּאֲשֶׁ֥ר <S%H834><s%> ka-'a-Sher he הִשְׁבִּיעֶֽךָ׃ <S%H7650><s%> hish-bi-'E-cha. according as he made thee swear

וַיַּ֥עַל <S%H5927><s%> vai-Ya-'al went up יוֹסֵ֖ף <S%H3130><s%> yo-Sef And Joseph לִקְבֹּ֣ר <S%H6912><s%> lik-Bor to bury אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> 'et- אָבִ֑יו <S%H1><s%> 'a-Viv; his father וַיַּֽעֲל֨וּ <S%H5927><s%> vai-ya-'a-Lu and with him went up אִתּ֜וֹ <S%H854><s%> it-To up כָּל־ <S%H3605><s%> kol- all עַבְדֵ֤י <S%H5650><s%> 'av-Dei all the servants פַרְעֹה֙ <S%H6547><s%> far-'Oh of Pharaoh זִקְנֵ֣י <S%H2205><s%> zik-Nei the elders בֵית֔וֹ <S%H1004><s%> vei-To, of his house וְכֹ֖ל <S%H3605><s%> ve-Chol and all זִקְנֵ֥י <S%H2205><s%> zik-Nei and all the elders אֶֽרֶץ־ <S%H776><s%> 'e-retz- of the land מִצְרָֽיִם׃ <S%H4714><s%> mitz-Ra-yim. of Egypt

וְכֹל֙ <S%H3605><s%> ve-Chol and all בֵּ֣ית <S%H1004><s%> beit And all the house יוֹסֵ֔ף <S%H3130><s%> yo-Sef, of Joseph וְאֶחָ֖יו <S%H251><s%> ve-'e-Chav and his brethren וּבֵ֣ית <S%H1004><s%> u-Veit house אָבִ֑יו <S%H1><s%> 'a-Viv; and his father's רַ֗ק <S%H7535><s%> Rak, but טַפָּם֙ <S%H2945><s%> tap-Pam only their little ones וְצֹאנָ֣ם <S%H6629><s%> ve-tzo-Nam and their flocks וּבְקָרָ֔ם <S%H1241><s%> u-ve-ka-Ram, and their herds עָזְב֖וּ <S%H5800><s%> 'a-ze-Vu they left בְּאֶ֥רֶץ <S%H776><s%> be-'E-retz in the land גֹּֽשֶׁן׃ <S%H1657><s%> Go-shen. of Goshen

וַיַּ֣עַל <S%H5927><s%> vai-Ya-'al And there went up עִמּ֔וֹ <S%H5973><s%> im-Mo, with גַּם־ <S%H1571><s%> gam- both רֶ֖כֶב <S%H7393><s%> Re-chev with him both chariots גַּם־ <S%H1571><s%> gam- both פָּרָשִׁ֑ים <S%H6571><s%> pa-ra-Shim; and horsemen וַיְהִ֥י <S%H1961><s%> vay-Hi become הַֽמַּחֲנֶ֖ה <S%H4264><s%> ham-ma-cha-Neh company כָּבֵ֥ד <S%H3515><s%> ka-Ved great מְאֹֽד׃ <S%H3966><s%> me-'Od. and it was a very

וַיָּבֹ֜אוּ <S%H935><s%> vai-ya-Vo-'u And they came עַד־ <S%H5704><s%> 'ad- against גֹּ֣רֶן <S%H1637><s%> Go-ren to the threshingfloor הָאָטָ֗ד <S%H329><s%> ha-'a-Tad, of Atad אֲשֶׁר֙ <S%H834><s%> 'a-Sher which בְּעֵ֣בֶר <S%H5676><s%> be-'E-ver which [is] beyond הַיַּרְדֵּ֔ן <S%H3383><s%> hai-yar-Den, Jordan וַיִּ֨סְפְּדוּ־ <S%H5594><s%> vai-Yis-pe-du- and there they mourned שָׁ֔ם <S%H8033><s%> Sham, there מִסְפֵּ֛ד <S%H4553><s%> mis-Ped lamentation גָּד֥וֹל <S%H1419><s%> ga-Dol with a great וְכָבֵ֖ד <S%H3515><s%> ve-cha-Ved sore מְאֹ֑ד <S%H3966><s%> me-'Od; and very וַיַּ֧עַשׂ <S%H6213><s%> vai-Ya-'as and he made לְאָבִ֛יו <S%H1><s%> le-'a-Viv for his father אֵ֖בֶל <S%H60><s%> 'E-vel a mourning שִׁבְעַ֥ת <S%H7651><s%> shiv-'At seven יָמִֽים׃ <S%H3117><s%> ya-Mim. days

וַיַּ֡רְא <S%H7200><s%> vai-Yar saw יוֹשֵׁב֩ <S%H3427><s%> yo-Shev And when the inhabitants הָאָ֨רֶץ <S%H776><s%> ha-'A-retz of the land הַֽכְּנַעֲנִ֜י <S%H3669><s%> hak-ke-na-'a-Ni the Canaanites אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> 'et- הָאֵ֗בֶל <S%H60><s%> ha-'E-vel, the mourning בְּגֹ֙רֶן֙ <S%H1637><s%> be-Go-ren in the floor הָֽאָטָ֔ד <S%H329><s%> ha-'a-Tad, of Atad וַיֹּ֣אמְר֔וּ <S%H559><s%> vai-Yo-me-Ru, they said אֵֽבֶל־ <S%H60><s%> 'e-vel- mourning כָּבֵ֥ד <S%H3515><s%> ka-Ved This [is] a grievous זֶ֖ה <S%H2088><s%> zeh This לְמִצְרָ֑יִם <S%H4713><s%> le-mitz-Ra-yim; Egyptian עַל־ <S%H5921><s%> 'al- and כֵּ֞ן <S%H3651><s%> ken after that קָרָ֤א <S%H7121><s%> ka-Ra was called שְׁמָהּ֙ <S%H8034><s%> she-Mah wherefore the name of it אָבֵ֣ל 'a-Vel מִצְרַ֔יִם <S%H67><s%> mitz-Ra-yim, Abelmizraim אֲשֶׁ֖ר <S%H834><s%> 'a-Sher which בְּעֵ֥בֶר <S%H5676><s%> be-'E-ver which [is] beyond הַיַּרְדֵּֽן׃ <S%H3383><s%> hai-yar-Den. Jordan

וַיַּעֲשׂ֥וּ <S%H6213><s%> vai-ya-'a-Su did בָנָ֖יו <S%H1121><s%> va-Nav And his sons ל֑וֹ lo; כֵּ֖ן <S%H3651><s%> ken Thus כַּאֲשֶׁ֥ר <S%H834><s%> ka-'a-Sher he צִוָּֽם׃ <S%H6680><s%> tziv-Vam. unto him according as he commanded

וַיִּשְׂא֨וּ <S%H5375><s%> vai-yis-'U carried אֹת֤וֹ <S%H853><s%> o-To בָנָיו֙ <S%H1121><s%> va-Nav For his sons אַ֣רְצָה <S%H776><s%> 'Ar-tzah him into the land כְּנַ֔עַן <S%H3667><s%> ke-Na-'an, of Canaan וַיִּקְבְּר֣וּ <S%H6912><s%> vai-yik-be-Ru and buried אֹת֔וֹ <S%H853><s%> o-To, בִּמְעָרַ֖ת <S%H4631><s%> bim-'a-Rat him in the cave שְׂדֵ֣ה <S%H7704><s%> se-Deh of the field הַמַּכְפֵּלָ֑ה <S%H4375><s%> ham-mach-pe-Lah; of Machpelah אֲשֶׁ֣ר <S%H834><s%> 'a-Sher which קָנָה֩ <S%H7069><s%> ka-Nah bought אַבְרָהָ֨ם <S%H85><s%> 'av-ra-Ham which Abraham אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> 'et- הַשָּׂדֶ֜ה <S%H7704><s%> has-sa-Deh with the field לַאֲחֻזַּת־ <S%H272><s%> la-'a-chuz-zat- for a possession קֶ֗בֶר <S%H6913><s%> Ke-ver, of a buryingplace מֵאֵ֛ת <S%H853><s%> me-'Et עֶפְרֹ֥ן <S%H6085><s%> 'ef-Ron of Ephron הַחִתִּ֖י <S%H2850><s%> ha-chit-Ti the Hittite עַל־ <S%H5921><s%> 'al- and פְּנֵ֥י <S%H6440><s%> pe-Nei before מַמְרֵֽא׃ <S%H4471><s%> mam-Re. Mamre

וַיָּ֨שָׁב <S%H7725><s%> vai-Ya-shov returned יוֹסֵ֤ף <S%H3130><s%> yo-Sef And Joseph מִצְרַ֙יְמָה֙ <S%H4714><s%> mitz-Ray-mah into Egypt ה֣וּא <S%H1931><s%> hu he וְאֶחָ֔יו <S%H251><s%> ve-'e-Chav, he and his brethren וְכָל־ <S%H3605><s%> ve-chol and all הָעֹלִ֥ים <S%H5927><s%> ha-'o-Lim and all that went up אִתּ֖וֹ <S%H854><s%> it-To he לִקְבֹּ֣ר <S%H6912><s%> lik-Bor with him to bury אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> 'et- אָבִ֑יו <S%H1><s%> 'a-Viv; his father אַחֲרֵ֖י <S%H310><s%> 'a-cha-Rei after קָבְר֥וֹ <S%H6913><s%> ka-ve-Ro grave אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> 'et- אָבִֽיו׃ <S%H1><s%> 'a-Viv. his father

וַיִּרְא֤וּ <S%H7200><s%> vai-yir-'U saw אֲחֵֽי־ <S%H251><s%> 'a-chei- brethren יוֹסֵף֙ <S%H3130><s%> yo-Sef And when Joseph's כִּי־ <S%H3588><s%> ki- for מֵ֣ת <S%H4191><s%> met was dead אֲבִיהֶ֔ם <S%H1><s%> 'a-vi-Hem, that their father וַיֹּ֣אמְר֔וּ <S%H559><s%> vai-Yo-me-Ru, they said ל֥וּ <S%H3863><s%> lu will peradventure יִשְׂטְמֵ֖נוּ <S%H7852><s%> yis-te-Me-nu hate us יוֹסֵ֑ף <S%H3130><s%> yo-Sef; Joseph וְהָשֵׁ֤ב <S%H7725><s%> ve-ha-Shev and will certainly יָשִׁיב֙ <S%H7725><s%> ya-Shiv requite לָ֔נוּ La-nu, אֵ֚ת <S%H853><s%> 'et כָּל־ <S%H3605><s%> kol- for all הָ֣רָעָ֔ה <S%H7451><s%> ha-ra-'Ah, us all the evil אֲשֶׁ֥ר <S%H834><s%> 'a-Sher which גָּמַ֖לְנוּ <S%H1580><s%> ga-Mal-nu which we did אֹתֽוֹ׃ <S%H853><s%> o-To.

וַיְצַוּ֕וּ <S%H6680><s%> vay-tzav-Vu And they sent a messenger אֶל־ <S%H413><s%> 'el- to יוֹסֵ֖ף <S%H3130><s%> yo-Sef unto Joseph לֵאמֹ֑ר <S%H559><s%> le-Mor; saying אָבִ֣יךָ <S%H1><s%> 'a-Vi-cha Thy father צִוָּ֔ה <S%H6680><s%> tziv-Vah, did command לִפְנֵ֥י <S%H6440><s%> lif-Nei before מוֹת֖וֹ <S%H4194><s%> mo-To he died לֵאמֹֽר׃ <S%H559><s%> le-Mor. saying

כֹּֽה־ <S%H3541><s%> koh- Thus תֹאמְר֣וּ <S%H559><s%> to-me-Ru So shall ye say לְיוֹסֵ֗ף <S%H3130><s%> le-yo-Sef, unto Joseph אָ֣נָּ֡א <S%H577><s%> 'an-Na I pray thee שָׂ֣א <S%H5375><s%> sa Forgive נָ֠א <S%H4994><s%> na Please פֶּ֣שַׁע <S%H6588><s%> Pe-sha' now the trespass אַחֶ֤יךָ <S%H251><s%> 'a-Chei-cha of thy brethren וְחַטָּאתָם֙ <S%H2403><s%> ve-chat-ta-Tam and their sin כִּי־ <S%H3588><s%> ki- thee רָעָ֣ה <S%H7451><s%> ra-'Ah unto thee evil גְמָל֔וּךָ <S%H1580><s%> ge-ma-Lu-cha, for they did וְעַתָּה֙ <S%H6258><s%> ve-'at-Tah henceforth שָׂ֣א <S%H5375><s%> sa and now we pray thee forgive נָ֔א <S%H4994><s%> Na, please לְפֶ֥שַׁע <S%H6588><s%> le-Fe-sha' the trespass עַבְדֵ֖י <S%H5650><s%> 'av-Dei of the servants אֱלֹהֵ֣י <S%H430><s%> 'e-lo-Hei of the God אָבִ֑יךָ <S%H1><s%> 'a-Vi-cha; of thy father וַיֵּ֥בְךְּ <S%H1058><s%> vai-Ye-vek wept יוֹסֵ֖ף <S%H3130><s%> yo-Sef And Joseph בְּדַבְּרָ֥ם <S%H1696><s%> be-dab-be-Ram when they spake אֵלָֽיו׃ <S%H413><s%> 'e-Lav. about

וַיֵּלְכוּ֙ <S%H1980><s%> vai-ye-le-Chu came גַּם־ <S%H1571><s%> gam- also אֶחָ֔יו <S%H251><s%> 'e-Chav, And his brethren וַֽיִּפְּל֖וּ <S%H5307><s%> vai-yip-pe-Lu and fell down לְפָנָ֑יו <S%H6440><s%> le-fa-Nav; before his face וַיֹּ֣אמְר֔וּ <S%H559><s%> vai-Yo-me-Ru, and they said הִנֶּ֥נּֽוּ <S%H2009><s%> hin-Nen-nu Behold לְךָ֖ le-Cha לַעֲבָדִֽים׃ <S%H5650><s%> la-'a-va-Dim. Behold we [be] thy servants
